units.title: Manage multiple units in a single platform
units.paragraph1: In all QualiSight plans, you start with one included unit to manage your operations without complications. Even if you have multiple branches or scattered environments, simply use the same account to easily add new units.
units.paragraph2: This way, you keep everything organized in a single dashboard, tracking checklists, reports, and service requests from each location without having to switch between different accounts or systems.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Does the free version have an expiration date or can I use it forever?
items.answer: No! The free version can be used indefinitely, with limitations on checklists and users.

items.question: Can I add more users or units as my business grows?
items.answer: Yes! You can upgrade your plan or add extra users according to your needs.

items.question: Do I need to install any app to use the platform?
items.answer: No installation needed. The platform works directly from your browser, including on mobile and tablet.

items.question: Can my cleaning team use it even without technical training?
items.answer: Yes! The system is simple and intuitive, with clear and accessible language for any employee.

items.question: What if I lose internet connection? Do inspections work offline?
items.answer: Some features require a connection, but we're developing offline mode. Contact us to learn more.
